title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 18, 2026 @ 4:06 PM
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Scanner — Wednesday, Feb 18, 2026 @ 4:06 PM ET

**🔥 TOP TRENDING:** Bitcoin crashes to $66K (5th straight weekly decline) as Fed hints at rate hikes • Trump announces $550B Japan trade deal with $36B for US energy • Riot Platforms stock jumps 9% on activist investor push for AI data centers • Kraken acquires token firm Magna ahead of IPO • Paul Allen estate begins selling Seattle Seahawks

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin plunges to $66,000** — Now on track for 5th consecutive weekly decline; Fed minutes mention possible rate hike triggering risk-off sentiment (CoinDesk)
- **Trump-Japan $550B trade deal** — Japan to invest up to $36B in US oil, natural gas, and mineral projects; manufacturers seeking govt help amid labor challenges (Yahoo Finance)
- **Riot Platforms stock surges ~9%** — Bitcoin miner rallies as activist investor Starboard urges AI data center expansion at Texas sites with 1.7 GW power capacity (CoinDesk)
- **Paul Allen estate selling Seahawks** — Super Bowl champion franchise up for sale (ESPN)
- **Chrome zero-day in the wild** — CVE-2026-2441 CSS vulnerability actively exploited (Hacker News #176pts)

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

**Indices:** Market weakness as Fed signals possible rate hikes; crypto-exposed stocks volatile

**Notable Movers:**
- **RIOT +9%** — Bitcoin miner stock jumps on Starboard activist push for AI data center pivot
- **Crypto stocks bounce** — Coinbase, Circle, Galaxy, IREN rebounding amid cooling AI fears (CoinDesk)
- **Chiefs restructure Mahomes deal** — Creating massive cap room, financial engineering play (ESPN)

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **Bitcoin: $66,000** — Down sharply, losing key support; Fed hawkishness weighing heavy (CoinDesk)
- **5th straight weekly decline** — Longest losing streak in months; next support at $64K
- **Ethereum staking controversy** — "50% staking milestone" data called "misleading" by analysts; actual staked ETH closer to 30% of supply (CoinDesk)
- **Base moves away from OP Stack** — Coinbase's Base network shifts tech, Optimism's OP token falls (CoinDesk)
- **Prediction market ETFs filed** — Bitwise aims to list ETFs tracking 2026 & 2028 US election prediction markets (CoinDesk)
- **NYSE tokenization launch** — Exchange to start 24/7 trading of tokenized assets later this year; President says felt "responsibility" to enter space (CoinDesk)
- **Trump WLFI stablecoin pilot** — Financial giant with $3.5T assets (Apex Group) to test USD1 stablecoin for tokenized fund flows (CoinDesk)
- **Arthur Hayes warning** — AI crisis will displace millions of workers, trigger credit defaults, but Fed response will drive Bitcoin to new record highs (CoinDesk)

---

## 🔵 Bloomberg

*(Bloomberg blocked automated access; unable to fetch headlines directly)*

---

## 🟠 Hacker News

Top trending stories (finance/tech/security):

1. **Tailscale Peer Relays GA** — 241 points, 104 comments ([tailscale.com](https://tailscale.com/blog/peer-relays-ga))
2. **Chrome CSS Zero-Day CVE-2026-2441** — 176 points, 93 comments; actively exploited in the wild ([chromereleases.googleblog.com](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2026/02/stable-channel-update-for-desktop_13.html))
3. **Cosmologically Unique IDs** — 161 points, 44 comments ([jasonfantl.com](https://jasonfantl.com/posts/Universal-Unique-IDs/))
4. **DNS-Persist-01 from Let's Encrypt** — 99 points, 39 comments; new DNS-based challenge validation model ([letsencrypt.org](https://letsencrypt.org/2026/02/18/dns-persist-01.html))
5. **Echo: iOS SSH+mosh client built on Ghostty** — 83 points, 35 comments ([replay.software](https://replay.software/updates/introducing-echo))

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

*(Reddit feeds blocked automated scraping; WSB rules page fetched showing active community of 3.4M members, 140K online)*

**Community signals:**
- Minimum YOLO: $10K options / $25K shares
- Gains/Losses must be >$2.5K options / >$5K shares
- Only BTC and ETH crypto discussion allowed
- No market cap <$500MM stocks (pump & dump protection)

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- **Japan-US energy deal** — Trump's $550B trade package includes major energy infrastructure investment; potential Tesla/energy play (Yahoo Finance)
- **Goldman CEO on Bitcoin** — David Solomon says he owns "very little" Bitcoin but watching it closely as an "observer" (CoinDesk)

---

## 💻 AI & Tech

- **OpenAI unveils EVMbench** — Tool (with Paradigm) to test whether AI can secure crypto smart contracts and prevent vulnerabilities (CoinDesk)
- **Kraken acquisition spree** — Buys token management firm Magna ahead of IPO push; adding token lifecycle infrastructure (CoinDesk)
- **AI job displacement warning** — Arthur Hayes predicts AI will displace millions of workers, trigger credit crisis, but Fed will respond with liquidity driving Bitcoin rally (CoinDesk)
- **Hyperliquid DeFi lobbying** — Launches policy center with $29M token backing; warns US risks being left behind as markets migrate to blockchain (CoinDesk)

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

**Top Headlines:**
- **Paul Allen estate selling Seahawks** — Super Bowl champion franchise up for sale (ESPN)
- **Chiefs restructure Mahomes contract** — Creating massive cap space for offseason moves (ESPN)
- **Sidney Crosby injured** — Canada captain leaves Olympic quarterfinal vs Czechia, getting imaging (ESPN)
- **Kyrie Irving out for season** — Eyes 2026-27 return after injury (ESPN)
- **Civil lawsuit vs Chiefs' Rashee Rice** — Alleges assaults (ESPN)
- **MLBPA turmoil** — Tony Clark scandal won't hinder CBA negotiations, exec says (ESPN)

**Olympics 2026 (Milan Cortina):**
- Mikaela Shiffrin wins giant slalom gold
- USA vs Sweden men's hockey quarterfinal underway
- Hilary Knight & Brittany Bowe engaged at Olympics

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Fed minutes: Possible rate hike** — Hawkish tilt triggering selloff in risk assets; Bitcoin, tech stocks under pressure (CoinDesk)
- **Japan energy investment** — $36B for US oil, natural gas, mineral projects as part of $550B trade deal (Yahoo Finance)
- **US manufacturing labor challenges** — NAM CEO says manufacturers need govt help with wage growth and employment struggles (Yahoo Finance)
- **Prediction markets influencing tradfi** — NYSE President says outcomes on prediction platforms now steering traditional market player decisions (CoinDesk)
